tool_description: GroupDocs.Translation Cloud is a REST API for translating English content of documents to other supported languages.
name: GroupDocs Translation Cloud
title: GroupDocs Translation Cloud

api_list.name: GetDocumentRequestParameters
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://groupdocs-translation-cloud.p.rapidapi.com/translation/info/document"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "groupdocs-translation-cloud.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetFileVersions

IsFolder.description: True if it is a folder.

ModifiedDate.description: File or folder last modified DateTime.

IsLatest.description: Specifies whether the file is (true) or is not (false) the latest version of an file.

api_list.name: ObjectExists

required_parameters.name: path
required_parameters.description: File or folder path e.g. '/file.ext' or '/folder'

Exists.description: Indicates that the file or folder exists.

IsFolder.description: True if it is a folder, false if it is a file.
